name: Astronomica
description:
Hi all,
This game was created by myself and Interior Cake for the HeartJam 2018 of which the theme was scarcity.

This game is a top down space exploration game where the goal is to find a new planet to call home but your ship has been damaged and you have a limited amount of energy to allocate to the different parts of your ship, concurrently, those parts (except your thrusters, thankfully) have been damaged you must find floating parts to repair them.

Good luck! ;)

BTW there are a few bugs haha. The scoreboard is not being drawn correctly and the textboxes disappear when you fly away from them without dismissing them including the initial one :P .
